content.rendered:
HOME NETWORKING

It’s Time to Make Your Home a Smart Home in Ontario
Home Networking is very important for fast speed, no matter what is your Wi-Fi speed most of the time it does not give good quality internet. We can help you with the networking and drop Ethernet cable to each room or close to the appliance for fast speed.
REQUEST A CONSULTATION

Home Networking Services Include:

Advanced Wifi

Operate all of your devices, without interruption, with a strong Wifi signal, designed to accommodate your needs.

Home Network

Increase internet access points and get a connection strong enough to connect all of your electronics and technology.

Is Home Networking Necessary?

The number of devices and equipment that you have connected to the internet at any given time considerably affects the speed and performance of the entire network. Network strength also depends on the size of your home and how far the signal needs to reach. During a consultation, we can analyze your needs, determine necessary upgrades, and make suggestions to help your internet run more smoothly and effectively. Home networking is becoming increasingly more important, even without a smart home setup, as more and more devices require access to the internet; your network is essentially the backbone of your home electronic systems. Our network designers are experts at configuring all of your electronics to operate with ultimate speed and reliability.

It Pays to Work With Hexa Control Home Automations

Quality Products

We carry products from Canada’s leading brands of home automation systems. We work with trusted industry leaders and experts in integrating all systems to work together seamlessly.

Honesty

We are honest in the delivery of our services. We always ensure you receive the care and attention you need as we work with you to build a smart home solution that fits your lifestyle.

Responsive

We are responsive to our customers. If you have a question about a smart home system, give us a call, and we’ll be happy to chat. We also make it easy to set up an appointment

Satisfaction Guarantee

We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee! It’s important to us that our clients feel secure in their purchase; if there is ever a problem with a product or an install, let us know right away.

Warranty

In addition to the manufacturer's warranty, we also warranty our work to ensure that you are never left high and dry. Our warranty covers all defects and faults made during installation.

No Hidden Costs

We are honest, upfront, and transparent about the work we provide. There are never hidden costs or added fees; we’ll work out a budget with you, and we’ll stick within it no matter what.

REQUEST A CONSULTATION
